channel.title: [317]Haalp, Prayer Problem CLICK TO SEE
channel.description:
is there a TUT on How to Add Full Working Prayer With icons?!
Click to see what i mean [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/de7neo/5]http://tinypic.com/r/de7neo/5[/URL] 1,Prayer Icons Fail they Some of them Dont Show on top of your Head & some Arnt the Right Type 2, Melee Protect = a Skull 3,Ranged protect= a Red Skull 4,Mage Protect = Nothing 5,Smite = Nothing 6,Redtrubution = Nothing
HELP ME PLEASEE

item.title: [317]Haalp, Prayer Problem CLICK TO SEE
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

this is a common “mental / idiotic” fix some people use, overall this is server sided but i will explain the cause of your problem.

in a nutshell its caused by loading headicons in playerhandler or player.java, since most of the developers of all wL sources were idiots, they only loaded headicons from one set of configs, the prayer configs, which is why on some servers it shows

(the prayers above the kalphite queen)
instead of the normal skull,

so all the previous server creator did was load the configs from the skull configs, which are why the prayer headicons do not work correctly.

Read full topic
